datenr.description: Sequential integer representation of the date

currentdate.description: Calendar date of the data point

open.description: The stock's price at the start of the trading day

high.description: The highest price the stock reached during the day

low.description: The lowest price the stock reached during the day

close.description: The stock's price at the end of the trading day

volume.description: The number of shares traded during the day

pchange.description: Percentage change in closing price from the previous day

dchange.description: Change in closing price from the previous day (in $)

yrhigh.description: The highest price reached in the past 52 weeks

yrlow.description: The lowest price reached in the past 52 weeks

dividend.description: Cash distribution per share paid to shareholders

exdivdate.description: The date on which a stock starts trading without dividend

peratio.description: Ratio of stock price to earnings-per-share

yield.description: Annual dividend as a percentage of stock price

avgvolume.description: Average number of shares traded over a period

weekbkdate.description: Date marking breakdowns into weekly periods

qtrbkdate.description: Date marking breakdowns into quarterly periods

yrbkdate.description: Date marking breakdowns into yearly periods

ytddate.description: Date marking breakdowns within the current year
